On 12/7/05, viveksaxena1975 <viveks@...> wrote:
> I havnt yet starte=
d using Junit, I am just considering.
> I need to develop test suite based =
on Unix and I dont want to use IDE.
> is that OK ?

Yes.

Further than that=
, I recommend it. Where I work, we always perform
builds (and the running o=
f their JUnit tests) for deployment to our
application servers on dedicated=
 build machines. We never perform
deployment builds on a developer's workst=
ation; far too many unknowns
and differences between developers and what th=
ey do to their machines.
